top_comments.comment:
A HUGE thanks to Drew and Linda Scott for helping design the interior of my new home! Go follow them on YouTube! https://www.youtube.com/athome. 

Would you like to see any other videos of the house? I can show whats in my fridge, pantry, Mike's Office, and more! Let me know

Can l ask a question?
How many Television's do you have?

comments_since_last_sample.body: Hi. I thought that you could put your cake turntables at the bottom if you have space because just in case you have to go somewhere and you don't have much time  at the bottom it could be a little  easier to get and you can only do this idea if you wanted to you don't have do it was just suggesting

Im not a fan of all of the white. There is just not enough color for me. YES I KNOW ITS NOT MY HOME AND IM NOT LIVING THERE JUST SHUT UP! I also wouldn't want to live in a house that looks like a catalog house. That house does not feel like a home. Also Wayfair? weren't they selling kids Lmao!
Oh my gosh what do you do for a living??!! You look like you live in a hotel! Lol is beautiful though.....wish I could afford such luxuries
I think u should name the barista Jessica lol 😂

Can l ask a question?
How many Television's do you have?
Yes we want a more detailed house tour as well
I'm surprised you didn't install one of those fancy permanent rolling ladders in your closet! Then you can roll from one end to the other like Belle in Beauty and the Beast!
i've watched The Property Brothers for such a long time, and to see DREW SCOTT helped make an amazing home for you!!! its crazy!!!
So happy for her. Having succes and enjoying it.
